title: LF scrims (Plat/Gold elo team)
body:
Hi everyone, my team (For What Reasons) are looking for a team interested to do a scrim within the next week before the start of Clash (29th November - 1st December). We are looking for a team within the Gold - Platinum elo range and available on the weekends. Our team consists of 4 gold players and 1 silver. We are mainly looking for a BO1 but if we have time, we can potentially make it a BO3. You must have your own team of 5 players. If you would like to discuss anything further, please comment about it :)

Thanks.

replies.body:
Ign: Twisted Hand
Disc: PrakritD#9585
Well rounded G1 Jungler
Main Champs: Mundo, Kha, LeeSin, ekko
But can play most jungle champs
Lane impact focused
